document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">autumn's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">interceptive </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">chill, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">Appalls </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">Tripoli </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: No autumn's interceptive chill
